title: Only seven 1909 Obaks remaining for sale...prices lowered!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Only seven 1909 Obaks remaining for sale...prices lowered!!
posts.post_content:
Have a large number of 1909 Obaks I'm parting with today.  Players and prices are listed below.  I made a note next to each player for any horizontal poses or handcut variations as well. 

Also, I measured each card by hand and if the card measures short, I mention that next to the player.  Many of these are indeed handcut variations and those measurements can vary somewhat.

Scans are available upon request and all prices include shipping.  

Thanks guys,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

****As of May 1, Updated List Below....****

Several cards have sold so far. I've now lowered prices on just about all of the remaining cards from anywhere from $15-50 on each one. Discounts considered for multiple purchases. Updated prices listed above...

Plus, for the first person who buys any card and requests it, I'll throw in a free Martinke horizontal! This is the rare variation of him trying to catch, uhhh, what appears to be a 2-liter of Coca-cola! 

Thanks in advance!
Brian

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=96701&d=1366489469[/IMG]
Wow Brian, those are great deals!
How much for the Martinke horizontal coca-cola variation?!

Scott, thanks for the kind words!

A few more cards have been sold.  List is updated above. Jon and everyone, I'm afraid the Martinke Coke-bottle Variation has been claimed.  I guess "buy-one-get-one-free" doesn't last long when it's applied to Obaks :)

A few more cards have sold and I've decided to give one final drop in price to the remaining cards.  Wasn't going to do it as the cards are already borderline below my cost at this point, but I am trying to raise a bit of money for Springtime auctions after all :)

Updated list regarding what I have left is below -

Beall VG one small corner wrinkle - $125
Berry GD one wrinkle - SOLD!!
Bodie VG/EX gorgeous card, no wrinkling - SOLD!!
Coy VG no wrinkling - SOLD!!
Carrol VG but measures short (handcut) - $75
Christian VG (handcut) - $125
Delmas FR/GD - $100
Ehman VG/EX (handcut) no wrinkling - SOLD!!
Graham VG/EX (handcut) gorgeous card! - SOLD!!
Hogan VG one 1 mm wrinkle on border - $125
Howse GD couple tiny wrinkles - $125
LaLonge VG (handcut) - $125
D. Lewis VG no wrinkling - SOLD!!
Martinke VG+ but measures short (handcut) ...tough HORIZONTAL pose! - $175
McKune GD - SOLD!!
Olson VG no wrinkles - $125
Orendorff PR (handcut) wrinkles, small notch in border - $50
Smith VG no wrinkles - $125
Whalen FR ...significant vertical crease - $75
J. Williams VG/EX no wrinkling...sharp corners - SOLD!!

Bump...some really nice cards available here and cheaply too!  Willing to listen to trade offers as well as cash offers.  Will discount for multiple purchases....Thanks!

Knocking a few more bucks off of all the cards that are left.  Hoping these are low enough to move as I think there's some really good deals to be had in this list :)  Will knock a few more bucks off for purchasing multiple cards as well! Thanks all!

Down to just the following 7 cards left. Some great examples left available though and prices have been lowered on all. All are very affordable and would either make a nice type card or in the case of the nicer ones, would make for a solid upgrade. Will discount for multiple purchases too. Thanks guys!
Brian
